lines.text:
[to Rhys as she flees Maxim's]
You really and truly are a perfect bastard!

[during a board meeting to consider letting the company go public]
Who didn't agree?
Sam, but it was not, uh...

[at his computers]
Double social security numbers! That's a crime even in France!

[to Elizabeth Roffe outside of Maxim's in Paris]
We're not going to make much of a team if you start acting like a neurotic bitch!
Remember, the cousins are just people.
Mmm, it's just people that terrify me. Particularly cousins.
You go in there, and you look them square in the eye, and you think of them sitting around the board table in their underwear.
Trouble is most of them look absolutely gorgeous.
